statements: SELECT * FROM user_behavior_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email, behavior_type FROM user_behavior_data WHERE behavior_type = 'login';
SELECT user_id, email, behavior_timestamp FROM user_behavior_data ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC;
SELECT email FROM user_behavior_data WHERE user_id > 10 AND behavior_type IN ('login', 'logout');
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM user_behavior_data;
SELECT user_id, email, behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM user_behavior_data WHERE behavior_type = 'login'
SELECT * FROM user_behavior_data WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, email, behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM user_behavior_data WHERE behavior_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND behavior_timestamp <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT DISTINCT behavior_type FROM user_behavior_data WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_behavior_data WHERE behavior_type IN ('login', 'purchase')
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT customer_id, email, behavior_data FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN email_campaigns ON customers.customer_id = email_campaigns.campaign_id
SELECT customer_id, email, behavior_data->>'last_purchase_date' AS last_purchase FROM customers WHERE behavior_data->>'total_purchases' > '5'
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_campaigns_sent FROM customers JOIN email_campaigns ON customers.customer_id = email_campaigns.campaign_id GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3
SELECT * FROM customers_table;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers_table WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM campaign_table ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior_table WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase' AND behavior_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(behavior_id) AS behavior_count FROM customer_behavior_table GROUP BY customer_id HAVING behavior_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM customers_table WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers_table WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM campaign_table WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type FROM customer_behavior_table WHERE behavior_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT customer_name, campaign_name FROM customers_table c INNER JOIN campaign_table p ON c.customer_id = p.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT customer_id, behavior_data FROM customers WHERE JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(behavior_data) > 3;
SELECT customer_id, campaign_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT template_id, template_name FROM email_templates ORDER BY template_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT customer_id, campaign_id, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Click';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE behavior_data ->> 'purchase_intent' = 'high' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT interactions.customer_id, customers.first_name, customers.last_name, interactions.interaction_date FROM interactions JOIN customers ON interactions.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, total_interactions, conversion_rate FROM campaign_results WHERE successful_interactions > 50 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
